issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.12 (foreground color: #00bfff, background color: #ffffff, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.12 (foreground color: #00bfff, background color: #ffffff, font size: 12.0pt (16px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.12 (foreground color: #00bfff, background color: #ffffff, font size: 9.6pt (12.8px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.12:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #007faa.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.12:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #007faa.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(14) > div > a:nth-child(1)

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.12:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #007faa.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.12:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #007faa.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(14) > div > a:nth-child(2)

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

issues.title: Document should have one main landmark
issues.description: Ensure the document has a main landmark

all.message: Document does not have a main landmark

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Document does not have a main landmark

issues.title: All page content should be contained by landmarks
issues.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks

any.message: Some page content is not contained by landmarks

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (58px by 15px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 15px instead of at least 24px.
